data.text: Ñɨn nab anɨb ak, gapman bɨnonɨm Helod, ne binɨb Klays yɨl yelak ogɨnap dɨl, kɨlop gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨm agɨl nag lak.
12.2 Mat 4.21, 20.23 Bɨne okok kɨlop agek, kɨli baynat dɨl Jemis nop pɨsnep puŋɨl lel kumak. Jemis, ne Jon nɨmam ne ak.

12.3 Apo 4.3 Helod agek anɨgelak, Juda binɨb okok tep agɨl nɨgɨlak. Pen anɨgɨl nɨgɨlak tek, Helod Pita nop abe agek, dɨ nag lɨlak. Gɨlak anɨb ak, Juda ñɨn awl kɨli Pasopa bilet ñɨbal ñɨn nab sɨŋak gɨlak.

12.4 Kis 12.1-27 Helod ne Pita nop anɨgɨl dam nag lɨl, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep anep jel pɨs kɨd ak kɨlop bɨlok tɨgawup tɨgawup lɨl, subnab maynab kod nep yenɨmɨb agak. Helod gos ne nɨgak ak, Pasopa ñɨn awl ak apɨl padɨkek yɨl, kɨdek nop dad binɨb yenɨgabal nab ak amɨl, kot gɨnɨgabun agɨl nɨgak.
12.5 Jem 5.16 Pen Pita anɨgɨl nag lɨl mɨdaknɨŋ, binɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak okok, nop nen agɨl, God nop kɨles gɨl agnɨg yelak.

Pen gapman bɨnonɨm Helod ne Pita nop kot gɨnɨm agɨl nɨgak ñɨn ak, maynab ayaŋ nop nag kɨles tɨmel omɨŋal tun gɨlak. Tun gɨl, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep omɨŋal adaŋ adaŋ nɨg yɨleknɨŋ, Pita nab ayaŋ kɨnek. Bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep ogɨnap seŋayaŋ mɨdɨl, kanɨbtub ak nɨg yelak.
Won anɨb ak, God ensel ne olap apɨl, kal mɨgan anɨb ak mɨlek pakñak. Pakñek, Pita tɨgɨlem nop pakɨl agak, Kasek tɨkjakan agak. Agek, nag kɨles tɨmel ñɨn nop tun gɨlak ak asɨkak.
Ensel ak nop agak, Sɨbnag nad ak pog lɨl, tob tɨlup ak lan agak. Agek, agak tek gek, ensel ak agak, Chech palawl ak le amnul agak.
12.9 Apo 10.3, 10.17, 11.5 Agek, chech palawl ne ak lɨl, kal mɨgan yek ak kelɨgɨl, ensel ak ayɨp saŋɨdɨlek. Ensel gak anɨb ak, Pita ne agnɨgak eŋ, ak day nɨgebin agɨl nɨgak.

12.10 Sng 34.7, Dan 3.28, 6.22, Apo 5.19, Hib 1.14, 2 Pi 2.9 Pen bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep nɨg yelak kanɨbtub omɨŋal ak sɨl gɨl, kanɨb kɨles tɨmel seŋayaŋ ak ke yɨkaknɨŋ, seŋayaŋ amnɨlek. Amɨl, kanɨb nab okok amɨlɨg, won anɨb anep ensel ak Pita nop kelɨgɨl amnak.

Anɨgek, nɨŋɨd anɨb agak, Mɨñɨl nɨgtep gebin agak. Ak Bɨawl nep, ensel ne ak agyokek, apɨl gapman bɨnonɨm Helod yɨp nag kɨles lup ak wɨsɨkup agak. Gapman bɨnonɨm Helod sek, Juda binɨb okok sek tap yɨp gɨnɨg gɨpal ak, gɨnɨgel tek ma lup agak.
12.12 Apo 4.23, 12.5, 12.25, 15.37 Anɨb agɨl, gos anɨb ak nɨgtep gɨl, bɨ Jon Mak nonɨm Maliya kal ak amnak. Kal anɨb ak binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl apɨl, God nop agnɨg yelak.
Pita apɨl, kanɨb ak pak gigu gek, pay Loda, ne kal anɨb ak bin wog gɨñeb ak, kanɨb ak yɨkɨnɨg owak.
Apɨl, Pita meg mɨgan anep agek nɨgak. Nɨŋɨd, mɨñmɨñ yɨbɨl gɨlɨg kanɨb ak sawl gɨl ma yɨkak, am binɨb okok kɨlop agak, Pita apɨl mɨdeb seŋayaŋ agak.

12.15 Mat 18.10, Apo 26.24 Agek agɨlak, Nep sawl lup ageban agɨlak. Anɨb agelak, kɨles yɨbɨl gɨl agak, Yepɨs ma apin. Nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl apin agak. Pita mɨdeb seŋayaŋ agak. Agek agɨlak, Ak ensel ne ak tek lup agɨlak.12.15 Ñɨn anɨb ak Juda binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl anɨgɨl gos nɨgɨlak, ensel ne wog gɨlɨg bɨ olap nop kod mɨdeb ak, bɨ anɨb ak tek yek.
Pen Pita kanɨb ak tepayaŋ pak gigu gek, am kanɨb ak yɨkɨl nɨgɨlak, Pita ne ke ap yek nɨŋɨd, wal yɨbɨl agɨlak.

12.17 Apo 13.16, 19.33, 21.40 Wal agɨlaknɨŋ, kɨlop ñɨn tɨg mɨlɨch gɨl agak, Ma yɨbɨl agɨnɨmɨb agak. Anɨb agɨl, kalabus kal yeknɨŋ, God ensel olap yokek apɨl, nop tɨtay gɨl dad owak takaw ak, kɨlop agñak. Agñɨl agak, Nɨbi Jemis12.17 Bɨ Jemis, gapman bɨnonɨm Helod ne bɨ Jemis anɨb ak nop paklak bɨ ak mel. Jemis olap ke yek.  nop agñɨl, bɨ Jisas yɨl mɨdebal okol kɨlop agñɨl gɨnɨmɨb agak. Agɨl, kɨlop kelɨgɨl, wakay olap ke amnak.
Mɨnek man tɨkaknɨŋ, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok Pita ma yek nɨŋɨd, tay gup agɨl ag aplan apyan gɨ yelak.
Gapman bɨnonɨm Helod ne anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, Pita nop kasek pɨyow nɨŋɨd dad owɨm agek, pɨyow mel nɨgelak, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok kɨlop kot gɨl agek, bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop pɨsnep paklɨlak.

Ñɨn anɨb ak gapman bɨnonɨm Helod, ne taun Taya binɨb okok sek, taun Saydon binɨb okok sek nɨgek, nop mɨlɨk yowak. Pen kɨli tap mɨdup delɨgɨpal, man Helod ne kodolɨgup ak. Anɨb ak Taya Saydon binɨb jɨmñɨl apɨl nop nɨgɨlak. Pen kɨli ned bɨ Blastus nop ap agnɨgelak, ne yaw agak. Bɨ anɨb ak, Helod kal nop kod yolɨgup. Agek, Helod nop am nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, Chɨnop mɨlɨk ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn, kɨmɨgel jɨmñɨl yonɨgun agɨlak.
Helod takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, ñɨn olap takaw agɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak. Ñɨn anɨb ak apek, bɨnonɨm kay lɨpal chech teplep yɨbɨl okok lɨl, bɨnonɨm besɨgep adek ak besɨgɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop takaw agñak.
Agñek agɨlak, Ak bɨ tek ma agup, God tek olap agup agɨlak.
12.23 1 Sml 25.38, 2 Sml 24.17, Sng 115.1, Dan 5.20 Pen God nop kelɨgɨl, yɨb ne ak ke dad aplanak tek, won anɨb ak God ensel olap agyokek, ap nop pakek tap awl gɨl, gogajɨŋ lek kumak.
Pen God takaw ak agñel amnaknɨŋ, man okok kɨd kɨd amnak.
12.25 Apo 11.29-30, 12.12, 13.5, 13.13, 15.37 Banabas ayɨp Sol ayɨp Jelusalem mɨdɨl, gɨnɨg owlek ak gɨjɨpul agɨl, Jon Mak nop poŋɨd adɨkɨd taun Adiyok amnɨlak.
